title: Phantasie
description: Newly arrived on the Isle of Gelnor, an adventurer entered the remote town of Pelnor. From the deteriorating condition of the once-prospersous shops, it was clear that things were amiss -- just the place where a corageous person might seek a worthy quest.
author: Filmon the Sage
technicalInfo: This is a tribute to Phantasie.  A simple game that I played when I was 12 or so, that somehow got under my skin and stayed with me for the rest of my life.

stringsList: You call that an adventuring party?
Press L to List all Guild Members in Gelnor
Press P to Purge a Guild Member
Press N to Create a New Guild Member
Press R to Rename a Guild Member
Press A to Add a Guild Member

parameterValues.stringValue: A passage with torches on the wall.
Here is a gate which you can not open no matter what you try.
A strange purple gas fills the air.  The party members choke and gasp.
You hear a noise in the distance.
There is a button on the wall.
A loud alarm begins ringing and you hear someone approaching.
There is a lever on the wall.
There is a scroll here on a table.

allQuestStepDescriptions.title: Obtain the Fire Rune
allQuestStepDescriptions.description: Get the Fire Rune, be sure to use some Oven Mitts +1 as this thing is sure to be hot!

outcomesTable.descriptionText: Yay!  You managed to do a quest you didn't even know that you had until a few seconds ago!

allQuestStepDescriptions.title: Obtain the Water Rune
allQuestStepDescriptions.description: Get the water rune.  You might need something magical to keep it in.

dialogLines.textLine: Welcome to the INN!  Do you want to spend the night for 10 Gold Pieces?
There are about 250 gold pieces here that appear to be covered with liquid.
As you approach the gold it fades and you are attacked!

userDialogs.title: There is a lever on the wall

dialogLines.textLine: A loud alarm begins ringing and you hear someone approaching.
There are 4 kinds of runes: earth, air, water, and fire.  The runes represent great power.  I am the keeper of the air run which I now present to you.
Hang on while I cast this spell.....
We can't beat up an old man.  Leave him be.
Hello noble adventurers!  Have fun with the rune!
It says something in Orcish about a valve.

userVariables.internalName: DNG1 NE STORAGE ROOM DOOR LOCKED

userItems.title: Bank Account Card
userItems.description: Bank of Gelnor Bank Account Card
documentFragments: Your account balance is 0 gold pieces.

userItems.title: Fire Rune
userItems.description: This is a chunk of lava.  It doesn't seem to ever cool down.

userItems.title: Water Rune
userItems.description: This rune is made of water, yet you can hold onto it.  How can that be?  Maybe it's just a chunk of ice?

userItems.title: Air Rune
userItems.description: This rune is as light as air.  Then why in the name of the gods is it so damn heavy?

userItems.title: Earth Rune
userItems.description: A chunk of dirt, but in rune form!

userItems.title: The History of Gelnor Part 1
userItems.description: Part 1 of the History of Gelnor
documentFragments: For many years the island of Gelnor remained isolated from the rest of the world.  It's people were busy with their own problems and paid little attention to other places. This isolation ended nearly one hundred years ago.

The evil sorcerer Nikademus brought his great army of men and beasts down upon Gelnor.  This great force laid waste to the land and it's people.  In a few short days it seemed that the battle was almost over.
In the last few days before the fall of Gelnor a bold plan was formed by its citizens.

userItems.title: The History of Gelnor Part 2
userItems.description: Part 2 of the History of Gelnor
documentFragments: In the last days before the fall of Gelnor the greatest wizards of the land gathered together and developed a plan to stop the forces of Nikademus.
With the aid of the Gods these nine wizards forged nine magical rings.  They planned to confront Nikademus himself with their combined power.
Nikadumus, however learned of their plans and sent his army to their hideout.  All of the wizards wer captured and all of the rings were taken.
Nikademus and his army then finished devastating Gelnor.

userItems.title: The History of Gelnor Part 3
userItems.description: Part 3 of the History of Gelnor
documentFragments: After the sorcerer Nikademus had conquered Gelnor he decided to take his great amry onward to conquer other lands.
Before he left, however, he punished those who had dared to oppose him.  He cast a powerful curse upon the nine wizards who had plotted against him.
Their bodies became shriveled and black, their minds wer rotted and filled with evil.  They now ride through the land as black knights terrorizing the citizens.
All who meet them must surrender all thier money or die.  The black knights continue to rule the land and collect money for Nikademus to this day.

userItems.title: The Gelnor Times
documentFragments: What's inside?
Trouble for Lord Wood.......Page 3
Gnome Hunt Tomorrow ....Page 4
Mama Troll's Elf Soup Recipe...Page 7
Dragon Island Discovered...Page 8
Weather Summoned for Today....Page 9

userItems.title: The Magic Pools
documentFragments: Many, many years ago, in the days before Nikademus invaded, the gods created three magical pools.  The pools brin good fortune to those who visit them.
The first pool can be found in the Northwest part of Gelnor.
The second lies somewher ein the east.
The third pool lies east of the star by the mythical town of Phantasia.  It is protected by magic and is nearly as difficult to get as it is to leave.

userItems.title: J. R. Trolkin
documentFragments: Many years ago when Nikdamus was invading Gelnor the men and beasts put aside their differences and joined together to fight him.
Nine great wizards developed a brilliant plan to stop him.
A lowly trolkin, who was an officer in the combined army of Gelnor, told Nikademus of the plan, thus it failed.
As a reward for this action the trolkin was give a great castle and dubed J.R. Trolkin by Nikademus.
J.R. Trolkin and his men help the Black Knights to this day.

userItems.title: The Nine Rings
documentFragments: When Nikademus overtook the Island of Gelnor, many years ago, he confiscated nine magical rings.
The makers of these rings were great wizards who intended to use them to destroy him.
Since he couldn ot harm the rings, Nikademus put them where they could be kept safely.
Three he left at the castle of J.R. Trolkin.
He gave three to the Clerics of Dosnebia.
The other three were lost in a great battle with Lord Wood.  They remain lost somewhere on Gelnor.

userMonsters.title: Bantir
userMonsters.description: What the hell is a Bantir anyway?

userMonsters.title: Giant Bee
userMonsters.description: This is a bee...but it is freaking HUGE!  One might even say it's gigantic!

userMonsters.title: drip slime
userMonsters.description: This is an ordinary slime except for one thing, it's dripping!

userMonsters.title: Skum
userMonsters.description: You guessed it, this is skum!

userMonsters.title: Coyote
userMonsters.description: What kind of wierd looking dog is that?

userMonsters.title: Giant Ant
userMonsters.description: It's an ant. But it's pretty large, you might in fact even say that it is giant!

userMonsters.title: Kobold
userMonsters.description: Kobold is german for elf, but what the hell is that thing?  Elf it be not!

userMonsters.title: Ranger
userMonsters.description: Look out for my scary arrows!

userMonsters.title: Scribe
userMonsters.description: A monk with such a bad case of writer's cramp and repetitive stress injury that he's turned evil!

userMonsters.title: Apprentice Devil
userMonsters.description: Works for a devil for XP only, no pay!  After his apprenticeship, he'll get to be a full on devil.

userNpcs.title: Bank
userNpcs.description: BANK has an account for each adventurer, and there are bank branches in every Gelnorian town.

userNpcs.title: Mystic
userNpcs.description: The Mystic gives an overall score for the party, so you can determine it's strength.

userNpcs.title: Armory
userNpcs.description: The Armory stocks weapons, armor, shields, scrolls, magic potions and healing potions.

userNpcs.title: Inn
userNpcs.description: The INN is where characters can have their hit points and magic restored to their maximum limit.

userNpcs.title: Guild
userNpcs.description: The GUILD is where characters are generated and then formed into parties!

userNpcs.title: Filmon the Sage
userNpcs.description: It is rumored that ther is an old but powerful sage who roams these lands.  His name is Filmon.

userNpcs.title: Old Man
userNpcs.description: This is a man, who happens to have quite a few years under his belt, making him old.
